channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: A #video showing several cows
item.description: A #video showing several cows being thrown into a swollen #river in #Satna district, #MadhyaPradesh, has gone viral on #socialmedia

item.title: PM #NarendraModi described the
item.description: PM #NarendraModi described the #PMJDY as an “endeavour to build an #India where each and every citizen, regardless of economic background, has access to formal #banking apparatus”
